commitResults.messageTitle: Implemented basic echo functionality.
Changed chat format to use colors. Refactored PixlBot printing.
Moved final values to new Values class.
Implemented list functionality.
Refactored code to use a new Task class.
Refactored code to use separate functions for each command.
Added command: mark (mark task as done).
Added command: unmark (mark task as not done).
Added Task subclasses ToDo, Deadline, Event.
Added commands: todo, deadline, event. Implemented new task system.
Fixed task add commands to accept multiple words.
Created automated test.
Implemented error handling using a new DukeException.
Added command: delete.
Added a message showing number of tasks left for add and delete operations.
Update bot to use switch/case for efficiency.
Implement saving and loading list data.
commitResults.messageBody:
Data is saved to 'src/data/duke' and loaded from the same location if it
exists.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change names to better follow Java standards (minor).
Convert Deadline dueDate field to java.time.LocalDate
Create new class Ui to handle user interactions
Create new class TaskList to handle list operations.
Create new class Storage to handle hard disk storage and retrieval.
Create Parser class to handle command re-direction + Create Command classes for all existing commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Create abstract class Command with subclasses for each of the existing
commands. Implementation not complete.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Duke to use new utility classes
Implement Command subclasses + Fix Storage
commitResults.messageBody:
* The Command subclasses all have an empty execute method and do nothing.
* The Storage class stores data as a TaskList, which has issues with
serialisation.

* Implement the execute method of each Command in accordance to original
behaviour.
* Change Storage class to store data as ArrayList<Task>.

commitResults.messageTitle: Divide classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody:
All files are in the same src/java directory. Move them into one of:
* common package duke
* duke.task
* duke.command

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit tests
commitResults.messageBody: Adding tests required adding equals() methods to some classes.

commitResults.messageTitle: (Minor) Replace an assertEquals with assertNull
Add jar file support
commitResults.messageBody: Changed default storage location to data folder at same level as src

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments and headers.
Refactor some code to follow Java coding standard
Add command: find
commitResults.messageBody: Also refactored command parsing to use a constant for regex.
